name: Virtual Soccer
overview: Footie at it's finest! HERE'S a soccer game that's so hot, your screen is cooking with action the minute you turn on the juice! Super shots! Off-sides! Penalties! Substitutions! Cheering fans! This one has it all! VIRTUAL SOCCER is a footie fan's dream come true! More than just a game, it's designed to let you experience every aspect of this spectacular sport! Just take a look at this: A choice of three pitches: Top view, Side view and Flat view. An international selection of 24 teams that vary from super tactical to downright dirty. Detailed graphics and animations. A variety of formations to choose from. Variable weather and pitch conditions. Player injuries. Realistic penalty shoot-outs. Intentional fouling. Five different referees ranging from blind to spartan. Super crowd effects. Individual statistics including Kick Power, Stamina and Speed. An after-match analysis. Need we say more?
